products.csv.base_demand: Baseline weekly demand level used by demand generator.
products.csv.promo_sensitivity: Multiplicative lift factor applied during promos.

costs.csv.holding_cost_per_unit_week: Holding cost per unit per week at DCs.
costs.csv.stockout_cost_per_unit: Penalty per unit of unmet demand/backlog at DCs.
costs.csv.production_cost_per_unit: Unit production cost (not used in reward by default).
costs.csv.transport_cost_per_unit: Unit transport cost (not used in reward by default).

sourcing.csv.primary_supplier: Primary supplier assigned to the product.
sourcing.csv.secondary_supplier: Secondary supplier assigned to the product.

routing.csv.primary_factory: Primary factory assigned to the product.
routing.csv.secondary_factory: Secondary factory assigned to the product.

lead_times.csv.base_lead_time_weeks: Base lead time in weeks (used in shipments_planned; sim uses stochastic variation around this).

demand.csv.demand: Realized demand units in that week/region/product.

capacity.csv.capacity: Effective production capacity (units/week) available for that product at that site.

policy_targets.csv.mean_weekly_demand: Average weekly demand into the DC (aggregated across its regions).
policy_targets.csv.lt: Average base lead time (factory->DC) used in target calculation.
policy_targets.csv.safety_weeks: Extra weeks of safety stock coverage.
policy_targets.csv.base_stock_target: Target inventory position for base-stock policy.

initial_inventory.csv.initial_on_hand: Starting on-hand inventory before week 0 simulation.

actions.csv.destination: Destination node (DC for orders; factory for production).

inventory_state.csv.in_transit: Pipeline inventory destined to this location (all open shipments).
inventory_state.csv.arrivals: Units received/arrived at this location in the current week.

rewards.csv.holding_cost: Holding cost incurred at the DC this week.
rewards.csv.served_units: Units actually shipped/served to customers from the DC this week.
rewards.csv.unmet_units: Units unmet this week (added to backlog).

shipments_planned.csv.ship_week: Week index when the order was placed/shipped (same as decision week).
shipments_planned.csv.arrival_week: Planned arrival week using BASE lead time.
shipments_planned.csv.base_lead_time_weeks: Base lead time used to compute arrival_week.
